task: Look up the definition and both UK and US pronunciation of the word \"reverie,\" and provide an example sentence using the word from Cambridge Dictionary.
Look up the definition and both UK and US pronunciation of the word \"reverie,\" and provide an example sentence using the word from Cambridge Dictionary.
user_action: type 'reverie' in the search bar with placeholder 'Search English' and press Enter to search for the word's definition and pronunciation.
observation: The definition of "reverie" is given as "a state of having pleasant dream-like thoughts." The UK pronunciation is /ˈrev.ər.i/ and the US pronunciation is /ˈrev.ɚ.i/. An example sentence provided is: "He was lost in reverie until he suddenly heard someone behind him."
